Susan Collins (Maine) on Thursday said she was “alarmed” by the firing of Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) Director Susan Monarez as ordered by the Trump administration.  Monarez was originally asked to resign but ultimately chose to hold firm to the post until the White House informed her of the removal. …

Trump’s order, titled “Making Federal Architecture Beautiful Again,” requires that he be notified 30 days in advance if government officials intend to…

title: 67 percent pessimistic Russia, Ukraine peace deal will be reached: Gallup

author: Laura Kelly
description: The Department of Homeland Security is proposing new restrictions on how long foreign journalists can stay in the United States legally, calling for stricter oversight of visa-holders’ activities while in the U.S. In a proposed rule published in the Federal Register on Thursday, DHS calls for limiting the foreign journalist visa to eight months. DHS said foreign…

Debra Houry, the chief medical center, also said three other CDC officials who resigned on Wednesday did so after Health…

description: President Trump’s approval rating dropped to a new low for his second term in the latest Quinnipiac University poll. In the five-day survey, which concluded Monday, 37 percent of registered voters say they approve of the president’s handling of his job, compared to 55 percent who disapprove. Primus, a Democrat, was nominated to serve on the five-member…
